description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Beetroot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Spiced Beetroot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 625g freshly cooked and peeled beetroot, cut into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and add the garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander seeds and chilli flakes. Stir-fry for 1-2 minutes, then add the beetroot. Fry, stirring gently, for 1 minute, then add the coconut milk, cardamom and lime rind and juice. Cook over a medium heat for 2-3 minutes.
Stir in the fresh coriander, season with salt and pepper and serve hot, warm or at room temperature.
